title: Deal close: Hearts meet Medeama over Tom Strand this evening
text:
20:25 CET Deal close: Hearts meet Medeama over Tom Strand this evening - www.allsports.com.gh 
Accra Hearts of Oak are meeting Medeama sc on Friday (today) evening over the transfer of Tom Strand to their outfit, a close source told Allsports.com.gh. 
The board of the Accra based side has also settled on Yaw Preko, a former player of the club, who is currently the assistant coach of the Black Meteors to assist the Medeama coach. 
In addition Hearts of Oak will hire Nassamu Yakubu, the Black Stars goalkeepers trainers as the goalkeepers' trainer of the club. 
15 local and foreign coaches applied for the Hearts of Oak coaching job and the club shortlisted 5, but have snubbed all of them to set their eyes on Tom Strand who has been on the radar of Togbe Afede, ever since he won the FA Cup with Medeama sc. 
Hearts of Oak struggled throughout last season and were at a point in time during the season threatened by relegation, but ended up escaping it, after the Disciplinary Committee declared them winners of their match day 25 home defeat against Asante Kotoko over the ineligibility of Obed Owusu and finished 4 on the league log. 
Due to this the Phobians want to restore their lost glory by reclaiming the Ghana Premier League they last won in the 2008/09 season.
